fields.description: ELAM provides protection for the computers in your network when they start up
fields.name: EarlyLaunchAntiMalwareDriverProtection

fields.description: A list of possible Firmware protection type for a device. Firmware protection is a set of features that helps to ensure attackers can't get your device to start with untrusted or malicious firmware. Firmware protection type is determined by report sent from Microsoft Azure Attestation service. Only Windows 11 devices will have values "systemGuardSecureLaunch" or "firmwareAttackSurfaceReduction" or "disabled". Windows 10 devices will have value "notApplicable".
fields.name: FirmwareProtection

fields.description: This attribute indicates if DHA is supported for the device
fields.name: HealthAttestationSupportedStatus

fields.description: This attribute appears if DHA-Service detects an integrity issue
fields.name: HealthStatusMismatchInfo

fields.description: The DateTime when device was evaluated or issued to MDM
fields.name: IssuedDateTime

fields.description: The Timestamp of the last update.
fields.name: LastUpdateDateTime

fields.description: A list of possible Azure Attestation states for a device. Azure Attestation setting status is determined by report sent from Microsoft Azure Attestation service. Only Windows 11 devices will have values "enabled" or "disabled". Windows 10 devices will have value "notApplicable".
fields.name: MemoryAccessProtection

fields.description: A list of possible Azure Attestation states for a device. Azure Attestation setting status is determined by report sent from Microsoft Azure Attestation service. Only Windows 11 devices will have values "enabled" or "disabled". Windows 10 devices will have value "notApplicable".
fields.name: MemoryIntegrityProtection

fields.name: SecureBootConfigurationPolicyFingerPrint

fields.description: A list of possible Azure Attestation states for a device. Azure Attestation setting status is determined by report sent from Microsoft Azure Attestation service. Only Windows 11 devices will have values "enabled" or "disabled". Windows 10 devices will have value "notApplicable".
fields.name: SecuredCorePC

fields.description: A list of possible System Management Mode levels for a device. System Management Mode levels is determined by report sent from Microsoft Azure Attestation service. Only specific hardwares support System Management Mode. Windows 11 devices will have values "notApplicable", "level1", "level2" or "level3". Windows 10 devices will have value "notApplicable".
fields.name: SystemManagementMode

fields.description: When test signing is allowed, the device does not enforce signature validation during boot
fields.name: TestSigning

fields.description: The security version number of the Boot Application
fields.name: TpmVersion

fields.description: Indicates whether the device has Virtual Secure Mode (VSM) enabled. Virtual Secure Mode (VSM) is a container that protects high value assets from a compromised kernel. This property will be deprecated in beta from August 2023. Support for this property will end in August 2025 for v1.0 API. A new property virtualizationBasedSecurity is added and used instead. The value used for virtualSecureMode will be passed by virtualizationBasedSecurity during the deprecation process. Possible values are 'enabled', 'disabled' and 'notApplicable'. 'enabled' indicates Virtual Secure Mode (VSM) is enabled. 'disabled' indicates Virtual Secure Mode (VSM) is disabled. 'notApplicable' indicates the device is not a Windows 11 device. Default value is 'notApplicable'.
fields.name: VirtualSecureMode

fields.description: A list of possible Azure Attestation states for a device. Azure Attestation setting status is determined by report sent from Microsoft Azure Attestation service. Only Windows 11 devices will have values "enabled" or "disabled". Windows 10 devices will have value "notApplicable".
fields.name: VirtualizationBasedSecurity

fields.description: Operating system running with limited services that is used to prepare a computer for Windows
fields.name: WindowsPE
